author: Clara-laeila Laudette,Belén Carreño
title: Four beats five as pandemic prompts shorter working week trials - Reuters
description: From travel to technology, employers across the globe are offering four day weeks as incentives to woo workers after the coronavirus pandemic upended their working patterns.
